title: Min-Max Finder
code:
§begin find_min_max
  data ← [45, 12, 67, 23, 89, 34]
  minimum ← 999
  maximum ← 0
  §iterate value §in data
    §if value ⊘ minimum
      minimum ← value
    §end_if
    §if value ⊗ maximum
      maximum ← value
    §end_if
  §end_iterate
  §transmit minimum
  §transmit maximum
§end
solution_description: finds both minimum and maximum values in an array
hints: Tracks both smallest and largest values seen
minimum starts high, maximum starts low
